content:
Hey All,

We're running another HAPI FHIR community survey. We'd really appreciate if you could take a few moments to fill this questionnaire out!

The community survey helps us prioritize where we focus development, so it should be worth your while. We're also pondering when it'll be time to upgrade our minimum supported JDK from the current JDK 8, so if you have opinions on that we'd love to hear them.

https://bit.ly/hapi-survey
Hi @James Agnew, are the outcomes of this one already available?
Hey @Ward Weistra ! Not yet, but they should be shortly. I was gonna compile the results into a post around the time of our next release which is mid-Feb.
Thanks @James Agnew, looking forward to it!
